name: Ultimate Flick Golf Challenge Mobile Game: Pixel Hole Madness
name_original: Ultimate Flick Golf Challenge Mobile Game: Pixel Hole Madness
description:
Golf 3D game is real golf game experience.

Are you getting bore with running and racing game? Golf 3D game is a 3D golf game it has different levels to play.Golf 3D game is introducing ultimate game environment in 3D view. It’s very easy to play and more easily controls. Game play instructions are mentioned in help. Golf 3D game has real physics motions in game play. You can enjoy ultimate golf experience in this game.

You can enjoy golf 3D game by setting direction of shot, 3D view gives you 360 rotating direction and you have to choose perfect suitable direction to reach till the flag. Tap on the ball button to adjust power of ball but carefully un-tap to screen because as you remove your finger it will set power and apply it on ball shot.

Features:

1.) Ultimate 3D environment.
2.) Power bar to hit power.
3.) Realistic physics engine.
4.) Stunning graphics.
5.) Amazing game play.
Download Golf 3D game !!!!!! enjoy the real experience of golf.
